page.title: 15An interesting resident (2)
page.content: For company she has 5 dogs and 9 cats. Her water is drawn from a nearby spring and for light and heat she uses paraffin.She says she doesn't miss electricity,particularly as a childhood friend was killed by a faulty electric iron.The Daily Telegraph comes by post and recently a telephone was installed.Shopping is a problem because of the lack of public transport;normally a van gives her a lift into Stroud and she gets a taxi back.Provisions have to be dragged down to the house by trolly.The local priest visits once a month for Communion.In the winter she is often snowed in for days. Wildlife abounds and "the birds sing like a benediction".There is a great deal of shooting and poaching.On one Remembrance Sunday she couldn't follow the radio service because of the guns.
